targets.expr: (topk(3, sum by(accountId) (delta(custom_googleapis_com:opencensus_pipeline_execution_end_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", environment="qa", status=~"FAILED|EXPIRED"}[1h]))) * 100 > 2) / sum by(accountId) (delta(custom_googleapis_com:opencensus_pipeline_execution_end_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", environment="qa"}[1h]))

(topk(10, sum by(accountId) (delta(custom_googleapis_com:opencensus_pipeline_execution_end_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", environment="prod", status=~"FAILED|EXPIRED"}[1h]))) * 100 > 2) / sum by(accountId) (delta(custom_googleapis_com:opencensus_pipeline_execution_end_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", environment="prod"}[1h]))

(topk(10, sum by(accountId) (delta(custom_googleapis_com:opencensus_pipeline_execution_end_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", environment="free", status=~"FAILED|EXPIRED"}[1h]))) * 100 > 2) / sum by(accountId) (delta(custom_googleapis_com:opencensus_pipeline_execution_end_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", environment="free"}[1h]))
